Package sttrswing.view.panels

package sttrswing.view.panels
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    sttrswing.view
     
    sttrswing.view.guicomponents
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EnterpriseStatus
    Takes the game state and represents the current state of the enterprise on the screen.
    NearbyQuadrantScan
    A view responsible for showing you the symbols of the surrounding quadrants.
    Options
    Presents a list of the main game options in a panel for the user.
    PhaserAttack
    Displays the controls for choosing how much energy to allocate to a phaser attack using a Slider.
    QuadrantNavigation
    Responsible for displaying an 8 button 'wheel' of DirectionButton for the 8 possible directions the Enterprise could be along and a Slider for how far to move it in that direction.
    QuadrantScan
    A view representing the internal state of the quadrant the player is in as a grid of squares, each indicating either empty, Klingon, Starbase, Star, Enterprise or unknown (i.e.
    Shield
    Displays the controls for choosing how much energy to re-allocate to shields using a Slider.
    Torpedo
    Shows controls for choosing the direction fire a torpedo using 8 DirectionButtons.
    WarpNavigation
    Displays and handles the actions for managing warp based navigation, creating a Slider with a maximum value of 8 and minimum value of to control distance, surrounded by a ring of DirectionButtons one for each of the 8 possible directions that will allow us progress a game turn, move between quadrants in the game and then return to our default view.
